details.description: Get help and advice on your employment rights - telephone, email, opening hours, website
details.body:
Help and advice on your rights at work.

Pay and work rights helpline

Enquiry form
Complaint form
Telephone: 0800 917 2368
Textphone: 0800 121 4042
Monday to Friday, 8am to 8pm
Saturday, 9am to 1pm

The service is free and confidential. The helpline has a free translation service available in over 100 languages.

You can get advice on issues including:

  • the National Minimum Wage
  • working for an employment agency
  • maximum weekly working hours
  • agricultural workers’ rights
  • working for a gangmaster
